message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high to me. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about $13,500?
